title: Shipping Policy
content: Shipping Policy: We deliver products within 5 to 7 business days. Free shipping is available for orders above ₹999.

title: Return Policy
content: Return Policy: Customers can return products within 7 days of delivery. The item must be unused and in original packaging.

title: Contact Us
content: Contact Information: You can reach us at support@shopifydemo.com or call +91 9876543210 during business hours.
